statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_statements;
SELECT statement_id, card_holder_id, statement_amount FROM credit_card_statements WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT card_holder_id, month, statement_amount FROM credit_card_statements WHERE statement_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_statements WHERE month = 'January' AND year = 2022;
SELECT statement_id, month, year FROM credit_card_statements ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_statements WHERE card_holder_id = 100 ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC
SELECT statement_id, card_holder_id, year FROM credit_card_statements WHERE statement_amount > 1000 ORDER BY statement_amount DESC
SELECT statement_id, year, month FROM credit_card_statements WHERE card_holder_id = 200 AND statement_amount < 500 ORDER BY month ASC, year DESC
SELECT * FROM credit_card_statements WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 'November' ORDER BY card_holder_id ASC
SELECT card_holder_id, SUM(statement_amount) AS total_amount FROM credit_card_statements GROUP BY card_holder_id HAVING total_amount > 2000 ORDER BY card_holder_id ASC
SELECT * FROM credit_card_holders;
SELECT cardholder_name, total_amount FROM credit_card_holders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, purchases, payments FROM credit_card_holders JOIN monthly_statements ON credit_card_holders.id = monthly_statements.cardholder_id;

SELECT cardholder_name, previous_balance, purchases, payments, new_balance FROM credit_card_holders JOIN monthly_statements ON credit_card_holders.id = monthly_statements.cardholder_id WHERE purchases > 5000;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_holders ORDER BY cardholder_name DESC;
SELECT statement_date, total_amount FROM credit_card_holders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT cardholder_name, total_amount, statement_date FROM credit_card_holders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT cc.cardholder_name, ms.new_balance FROM credit_card_holders cc JOIN monthly_statements ms ON cc.id = ms.cardholder_id WHERE ms.new_balance < 0;
SELECT cc.cardholder_name, ms.purchases, ms.payments FROM credit_card_holders cc JOIN monthly_statements ms ON cc.id = ms.cardholder_id WHERE ms.purchases > ms.payments ORDER BY ms.purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements;
SELECT statement_id, cardholder_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM cardholders ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT cardholder_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY cardholder_id;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM cardholders WHERE cardholder_id = 1;
SELECT total_amount, statement_date FROM monthly_statements WHERE total_amount > 5000;
SELECT cardholder_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_id, transaction_amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_holders;
SELECT holder_id, holder_name, card_number FROM credit_card_holders WHERE holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT statement_id, total_amount_due FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY total_amount_due DESC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM credit_card_holders WHERE card_number LIKE '1234%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_holders WHERE holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.amount, monthly_statements.total_amount_due FROM transactions JOIN monthly_statements ON transactions.holder_id = monthly_statements.holder_id;
SELECT holder_name, card_number FROM credit_card_holders ORDER BY holder_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address, statement_date FROM credit_card_holders WHERE holder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT statement_date, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE cycle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT statements.* FROM monthly_statements INNER JOIN billing_cycle ON monthly_statements.cycle_id = billing_cycle.cycle_id WHERE billing_cycle.end_date > '2022-10-31';

SELECT payments.amount, payments.payment_date, monthly_statements.total_amount FROM payments INNER JOIN monthly_statements ON payments.statement_id = monthly_statements.statement_id WHERE payments.amount < 500 ORDER BY payments.payment_date;
